<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description>GldelAggregate to overcome java float calc issues</description><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>GlideAggregate cmdb</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[//GlideAggregate 

		var compSumRecords = new GlideAggregate('cmdb_ci_computer');
		compSumRecords.addAggregate('COUNT');
		compSumRecords.query();

		while(compsumrecords.next()){
			var count = compSumRecords.getAggregate('COUNT');
			gs.info('--->count: ' + count);
			
		}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-13 22:13:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b58ee68071b5410c11df2218c1ed05d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GlideAggregate cmdb</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Domino App" source="x_513186_domino_ap">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Domino App">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_7b58ee68071b5410c11df2218c1ed05d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-13 22:13:09</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
